title: Music and Production
description: We are looking for passionate individuals that are fond of playing and singing instruments like guitar, drums, keyboard, bass, and vocals. Join us in worshiping the Lord on stage with your musical talents.

title: Media and Creatives
description: Join our church's Media and Creatives Team to pursue your calling to serve the Lord. We are looking for people who are skilled in photography, camera operation, clicker mastery, OBS, and can manage social media using Photoshop and video editing.

title: Ushers
description: Join our growing team and serve the Lord by greeting visitors with a warm smile.

title: Security
description: Take part and help maintain the peace of our church community.

title: Medical Team
description: If you are eager to provide your medical expertise to help those in need, make a significant contribution with us today.
